name: LoPoly Lounge
description:
Im a 16-year-old game dev trying to make enjoyable games for people.

This game centers around you playing with terrain settings and seeing what results you will get. It's more of a simulation than a game, but I think anyone can enjoy this even for a short while.

This is what is considered an ambient chill game, the main focus is for people to relax when they are playing. The game follows a low-poly aesthetic with saturated colors and lofi music.

There are 3 Lofi tracks.

Hope you too enjoy it and give me some of your thoughts on the project :)
